# cloudkarafka Provider

Interact with Cloudkarafka.

## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configuration-based authentication
provider "hashicups" {
  username = "education"
  password = "test123"
  host     = "http://localhost:19090"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `apikey` (String) API keyr Cloudkarafka API.
